metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5733 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the refreshAdvancedAccessibilityOfItem function in wp-admin/js/nav-menu.js in WordPress before 4.2.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an accessibility-helper title.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5733` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfifteen - 4.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.3+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3+dfsg-1').
